question: Can [game] be added?
answer: A simple way to find this out is by looking up what programming language [game] was coded in. If it is unity, unreal engine, game maker, godot, or javascript it probably will work. If it is c, c++, or java it probably won't work.

question: Will anything that isn't a game or doesn't have to do with the website be added?
answer: No, unless it's relevant in some way.

question: What games might be added soon?
answer: 10 Minutes Till Dawn, Google Doodle Baseball, 2 Player Slope, N-Gon, PvZ, and Sandspiel. Maybe Deltarune.

question: When do you check suggestions?
answer: Suggestions will always be read at some point and considered, even if it takes a month to do so.

question: The website is broken!
answer: This website is checked regularly even if it's not being actively updated. However, almost everything should be working right now. Submit a suggestion if the website is broken.

question: The website isn't loading!
answer: Because of a recent site overhaul relaunching this site is extremely easy. You can even fork the GitHub repo yourself and make your own website based off this one.

question: Why can't [game] be added? It's possible to add!
answer: Maybe it's possible, but either it runs extremely slowly in a browser, is multiplayer, or it is impractical to host. Any multiplayer games will not be added due to server costs.

question: I hacked your firebase database!
answer: Wow, you hacked this website. Amazing. GitHub pages sites are very finicky with firebases' auth, so this will likely never be fixed unless someone makes a pull request.
